# intervalCount

**Instance Property**

The number of interval units that make up the total payment interval.

## Declaration

```swift
var intervalCount: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `1`, which requests a recurring payment every one [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKRecurringPaymentSummaryItem/intervalUnit].

## Setting the payment interval

- **intervalUnit**: The amount of time – in calendar units such as day, month, or year – that represents a fraction of the total payment interval.
